title: GoPro VR BTS: Filming "The Carnival Mask Maker"
description:
Join Mike Pfau as he explores Venice, Italy while filming GoPro Spherical VR footage during Carnival. He meets Carnival mask-making artisan and manager of Ca'Macana, Davide Belloni, and learns the age-old tradition of the Carnival Mask.

Shot 100% on the HERO4® camera

Music
Nicholas Joseph Nolan, "Venice The Menace"

asset.title: GoPro VR BTS: Filming "The Carnival Mask Maker"

Join Mike Pfau as he explores Venice, Italy while filming GoPro Spherical VR footage during Carnival. He meets Carnival mask-making artisan and manager of Ca'Macana, Davide Belloni, and learns the age-old tradition of the Carnival Mask.
